mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Applause", "Get To Know: Toots Richardson", "Alphabet Soup", "Uncle Sam - Taxes", "Single Square Dancer", "Where It's At", "Heaven is South Texas", "Quarterly Selection", "National Convention" and "Convention Registration Form." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Discovery", "Advanced Dancing", "Contra Corner", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Experimental Notes", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Ammunition", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
